WINE LIST
CHAMPAGNE
RED WINES
BILLECART SALMON
MERCUREY
Billecart-Salmon Brut Champagne
The house of Billecart-Salmon was founded in
1818 in Mareuil Sur Ay near Epernay, in the
heart of the Champagne region. This cuvee
is a blend of 35% Chardonnay, 35% Pinot
Noir and 30% Pinot Meunier grapes which
come from the very oest vinevards in Marne.
Its bright straw-colour is complemented by a
stedov mousse of slow v rising oubbles. is
nose is of ripe pears with a delicate touch of
cut hay. Billecart-Salmon has an elegant
fruity flavour, leaving a clean fresh taste in
the mouth.
WHITE WINES
Mercurey Domaine Louis Max 2001
Mercurey Domaine Louis Max 200l was
produced in the Burgundy - Côte
Chalonnaise area usina 00% Pinor Noir
grapes. It is deep and intense cherry red in
colour. Its bouquet is powerful, with
concentrated aromas of raspberry,
blackberry, liquorice and vanilla. This wine
offers a pleasant taste of wood and a good
balance between fine tannins and fruit.
Enjoy this wine with red meat, game or ripe
cheeses.
POUILLY- FUISSE
Jaboulet-Vercherre Pouilly Fuissé 2002
The Pouilly Frissé vinevards are located at
Mâconnais, the southern part of Burgundy,
France Taboulet.Vercherre Poullv Fuisse
2002 is produced from 100% Chardonnay
grapes. Pale gold in colour, the 2002
vintage is fresh, rich in fruit characters with
honey notes and a long aftertaste. It goes
well with seafood dishes particularly those in
• cream sauce.
Vieux Château Landon, Cru Bourgeois
Médoc 2001
Vieux Château Landon is a small Château
situated in Médoc which has a very limited
production every year. The 2001 vintage is
deep ruby in colour, with delicate dark
cherry and matured red fruit characters,
and a touch of chocolate and prune
flavours. It is full bodied with soft tannins.
This delicious wine goes very well with
most or the meat dishes
Green Point Yarra Valley Chardonnay 2004
The 2004 Green Point Yarra Valley
Chardonnay is a pale straw colour with a
green hue. The wine has complex characters
that inclides hints of fresh peaches,
cinnamon and snicy vanillin oak The use of
fine French oak barriques adds structure and
lenath to the back palate, and the finish is
long, lingering and crisp.
CX SIGNATURE DRINKS
PORT
CATHAY DELIGHT
A kiwifruit based non-alcoholic
drink with coconut juice and a
touch of fresh mint.
PACIFIC SUNRISE
A refreshing combination of
champagne and Drambuie with
the zest of orange and lemon.
Dow's Late Bottled Vintage Port 1999
This wine is sourced from the same vineyards
that in exceptional years produce Dow's
renowned Vintage Ports. It is aged solely in oak
casks and bottled S to o years after the harvest.
It is a full rich Port with spicy fruit flavours and
an elegant aromatic nose, well rounded on the
palate and has the traditional Dow's drier
finish. This makes it one of the finest Late
Bottled Vintage Ports available.
APERITIFS AND COCKTAILS
Gin • Rum • Vodka • Martini Rosso • Martini
Extra Dry • Campari • Sweet and Dry Sherry •
Bloody Mary • Screwdriver

BEER
International Selection
Cathay Pacific aime to offer a diverse solection of wines on
board - but apologies if on some flights a certain wine is
not available. Our crew will always be happy to
recommend an alternative.
